body: These simple goggles, made of two emeralds attached to a twin frame, grant the wearer low-light vision and a +5 compentence bonus on Spellcraft checks to identify magic auras and items. If the wearer already has low-light vision, it grants the wearer double the normal range for low-light vision.
name: Goggles of Elvenkind
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Eyes/Eyes Slot Wondrous Items/Goggles of Elvenkind
